comment: Do not take this teacher if you want to write a ton of papers and also have business analytics included for a whole paper. If I could give a 0/5 I would.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Lots of homework--So many papers

comment: Horrible teacher do not take her. Does not answer emails at all and does not care for students like she says. This teacher is god awful.

Her lectures are very long and if you are not interested in the topic being discussed, they can go by very slowly. However, she is a great teacher. If you do not attend class you will not pass, but if you do it should be an easy A. Definitely recommend.
rating_tags: Group projects--Lecture heavy--Graded by few things

comment: Great professor, taught well, learned a lot and was very understanding. She is caring and overall a nice professor to have. If you can take her class defiantly do it!

I can't rave about Professor Kalamas enough. Shes a great teacher and makes class interesting. I actually learned things in her class. Quizzes are fine if you study. The project was good but choose partners well and early! She is inspirational and I feel deeply moved by her. Shes the kind of professor you fight to get on registration day. Take her!

TAKE HER!!!! Professor Kalamas was one of the most effective professors I have had in all of my college career. 5 quizzes, no tests, and a group project. Go to class and take notes and you will pass. She gave me knowledge not only in Marketing Research, but in life. I hope she teaches another class so I can take her again.

Service Marketing is an easy A. Professor Kalamas sets her students up for success as long as you show up. I loved the way she does her lectures. She has her unfilled PPT notes online and you fill them during class. She gives study guides and makes it very easy to do well on the tests. Make sure you get the textbook!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Amazing lectures

comment: Professor changed the course schedule in the middle of the semester. There are weekly discussion papers due every week, sometimes multiple. One week we had 4 papers and 4 quizzes due. Quizzes are all proctored using lockdown and webcam. You can't work ahead in this course. The course work isn't difficult but it is very time-consuming.

One of the worst classes I have taken ever. Do not take this professor. Weekly quizzes with lockdown browser on course material that has not been updated in years. Weekly papers, yes PAPERS. Quizzes were only available on the weekend and mid-semester she changed deadlines around. 15-page paper to end the semester with. Literally the worst ever.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--So many papers--Tough grader

comment: Weekly Homework: 1-2 closed-book, 30 question, timed quizzes (She uses Lockdown & webcam!) & discussion essay (1-2 pages, single spaced). She gives practice quizzes, I highly recommend taking those. Final: No Final Exam, BUT there is a 20-page MKTG plan project instead. Schedule: All quizzes are only open Fri-Sun each week. Can't work ahead.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--Get ready to read

comment: She sets her students up for success as long as you show up. I really enjoyed her and the way she does her lectures. She has her unfilled notes online and you fill them during class. She gives study guides and makes it very easy to do well on the tests. If I showed up to class more I would have gotten an easily. Don't skip class kids.

The class is as difficult as you make it. Dont skip and literally do everything she tells you and youll make an A. She knows her stuff and wants you to know it to. If I wasnt graduating Id take her again.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Beware of pop quizzes--Lecture heavy

comment: Very knowledgable about subject and loves what she does. The topic itself is interesting and she relates it to real world examples each lecture. Tests are from study guide and your notes. Group project is easy with a hard working group. Sweet lady, would take again for sure
Pretty easy. Tests are straight form the notes and study guide. Group project is easy if you have a decent team. She knows her stuff and she is approachable.
WHAT A JOKE OF A PROFESSOR!

The lectures are pretty dry. If you don't show up & fill in the notes on the pwr. pt., you will not do well on the 3 tests. The group project sucks, but it wasn't very hard. Easy to get an A if you show up to class, take notes, study for the tests, & have a good group for the project. I took this class b/c I needed an elective, so I didn't try hard
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Kalamas is a very knowledgeable professor with lots of experience  in everything she teaches. She gives you a review packet before each test and stars the most important things. You need the book, but she only highlights figures and tables to look at, she does not make you read entire chapters. This is what a college professor should be. TAKE HER!

If you like critical thinking, don't take this class because your opinion doesn't matter. Papers are prescriptive and if you don't follow her pages of guidelines you'll do poorly. Tests are tricky and don't test learning. Tests only test how well you can memorize and regurgitate her opinions. Would not take another class by her.
Great teacher overall! Clear from day 1 of the expectations that are expected of each student. One group project and three tests; come to class and take notes, participation is important.

Show up and take notes and there is no way you can't get an A+. She even gives you a study guide before the test. The tests are very tricky so you really need to know the material before you walk in or you will fail. Make sure you get a hard working group for the group project. Also, she gives mini participation quizzes in class!

Extremely fair.  Show up to class, do the work, and you will be rewarded.  She tells you what the exam will cover specifically, and practically gives you the exam questions.  If you just go to this class, I find it hard to believe that you could make less than a B.
She is great and very helpful. Attendance is mandatory but class is entertaining. Great professor!Definitely recommend taking her

Kalamas is really easy and it is not hard to get an A in her class, but I honestly have no interest in taking another class from her. She is very dull and kind of awkward in my opinion. she tells you almost the exact questions the tests will have on them, and you can pretty much pass on common sense alone.
Incredibly knowledgable prof...you WILL learn from her!  Passionate about e-marketing and marketing research.  Very easy if you attend class.  Takes attendance.  Hands down, my favorite prof so far.
Great teacher! I highly reccomed. You have to attend class to really do well but it's worth going to. She really knows her stuff and is extemely helpful!

She expects alot of work with group projects.Most of your grade is based on the project. So if you dont have a good group your grade will suffer. She is very clear on what to expect on exams, but there is only 2 tests.Not sure if I would reccommend.
very easy! group project is very easy, she gives you the exact slides that will be on the exams, with extra credit, takes attendance but easy class worth going to
